constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 116 (Thursday, July 14, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. NEGUSE:
H.R. 8385.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H6624]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

title: To require the Under Secretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness to conduct a study on the benefits of licensure reform for the hiring of military spouses.
